cause.description:
The Foundation's mission is to provide varied fire safety education programs and activities in furtherance of the fire safety education programs of the New York City Fire Department and its residual beneficial effect upon the residents of the City and State of New York, and for the benefit of programs to promote the professional development, training and educational interests of the members of the New York City Fire Department and others in all areas of fire administration, fire-fighting, fire prevention and investigation, and the provision of emergency medical services and its residual beneficial effect upon the residents of the City and State of New York.
1. The FDNY Foundation supports the critical life saving work of the Fire Department of New York. As the official fundraising vehicle for the FDNY for more than two decades
cause.mission: The FDNY Fire Zone is a project of the FDNY Foundation. Make a tax-deductible contribution today to help us continue saving lives through fire-safety education
cause.name: The FDNY Foundation
